title: 2015 Challenger Series Qualifiers
body:
I can't seem to find an answer anywhere by searching.
Does anyone know if the NA Challenger Series qualifiers are going to be streamed or not?

replies.body:
Hey Chronnis. The CS Qualifier matches will be done off broadcast. We will have gameplay VODs available ~24-48 hours after the match-ups. 

If prefer not to wait for the VODs and want to see the results, head on over to bracket: http://na.lolesports.com/na-cs/2015/spring-qualifier/standings
